doctor.name: Prof. Dr. (Brig. Gen.) Shahnur Chisty
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. (Brig. Gen.) Shahnur Chisty is a respected gynecology, obstetrics, and laparoscopic surgery specialist in Dhaka. She holds an MBBS, DGO, and FCPS (OBGYN), along with Post Fellowship Training in Gynecological Laparoscopy from India. Dr. Chisty specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of women’s health issues including menstrual disorders, uterine fibroids, ovarian cysts, endometriosis, infertility, high-risk pregnancy, polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), menopause management, and cervical cancer screening. She is also skilled in performing minimally invasive laparoscopic surgeries for conditions like ectopic pregnancy, ovarian tumors, and uterine fibroids. Dr. Shahnur Chisty serves as a Classified Specialist in Obstetrics & Gynecology at Combined Military Hospital (CMH), Dhaka. She consults patients at Medinova Medical Services, Mirpur, located at Plot # 29-30, Block # Kha, Road # 1, Section # 6, Mirpur 10, Dhaka, with visiting hours from 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Plot # 29-30, Block # Kha, Road # 1, Section # 6, Mirpur 10, Dhaka

doctor.name: Dr. Tanzila Halim
doctor.info: Dr. Tanzila Halim is a dedicated Gynecology and Obstetrics Specialist and Surgeon in Dhaka, with expertise in managing pregnancy care, normal and cesarean deliveries, menstrual disorders, ovarian cysts, uterine fibroids, infertility, and gynecological surgeries. She holds an MBBS from Dhaka and an FCPS in Gynecology & Obstetrics, and currently serves as an Assistant Professor of Gynecology & Obstetrics at Bangladesh Medical University (PG Hospital). Dr. Tanzila Halim provides comprehensive care for women’s health issues, ranging from antenatal checkups to advanced surgical management of gynecological diseases. She consults at Kingston Hospital Limited, located at House # 51-54, Road # 01 & 02, Block # D, Pallabi, Mirpur-12, Dhaka, with visiting hours from 5pm to 7pm, closed on Fridays.

chamber.address: House # 51-54, Road # 01 & 02, Block # D, Pallabi, Mirpur-12, Dhaka

doctor.name: Dr. Jasmine Sultana
doctor.degree: MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Obs & Gyne), FCPS (Gyne Oncology, P2)
doctor.info: Dr. Jasmine Sultana is a skilled gynecology, obstetrics, and infertility specialist in Dhaka, offering comprehensive care for women’s reproductive health. She holds an MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS in Obstetrics & Gynecology, and FCPS (Gyne Oncology – Part 2), along with specialized training in infertility from India. Currently serving as a Consultant in Gynecology & Obstetrics at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital, Dr. Jasmine provides expert care for menstrual disorders, PCOS, infertility, recurrent pregnancy loss, high-risk pregnancies, gynecologic tumors, uterine fibroids, and menopausal issues. She is known for her patient-friendly approach, precise diagnosis, and surgical expertise. Patients can consult her at Aalok Health Care, Pallabi, located at 2/6 Begum Rokeya Avenue, Mirpur 11.5, Dhaka, from 11:00 AM to 2:00 PM on Thursday, Friday, and Saturday.

chamber.address: 2/6 Begum Rokeya Avenue, Pallabi, Mirpur 11.5, Dhaka

doctor.name: Dr. Rumana Sultana
doctor.degree: MBBS, FCPS (Gyne & Obs), MS (Gyne & Obs), BCS (Health)
doctor.info: Dr. Rumana Sultana is a highly experienced gynecology and obstetrics specialist in Dhaka, with advanced training in infertility management, laparoscopic surgery, and long-term family planning. She holds an MBBS, FCPS, MS in Gynecology & Obstetrics, and BCS (Health), and currently serves as an Associate Professor at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Sultana provides expert care for a wide range of women’s health issues, including menstrual disorders, PCOS, infertility, high-risk pregnancy, uterine fibroids, endometriosis, ovarian cysts, and menopausal problems. Her compassionate approach and skill in minimally invasive surgery make her a trusted name among patients seeking modern and effective gynecological care. She sees patients at Aalok Health Care, Pallabi, located at 2/6 Begum Rokeya Avenue, Mirpur 11.5, Dhaka, from 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM (closed on Mondays and Fridays).

chamber.address: 2/6 Begum Rokeya Avenue, Pallabi, Mirpur 11.5, Dhaka
